tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_smart_contracts (
    smart_contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_status VARCHAR(50),
    contract_date DATE,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    provider_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    specialty VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    provider_id INT NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  provider_id UUID REFERENCES HealthcareProviders(provider_id),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    prescription VARCHAR(100),
    record_date DATE
);
